ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Akebono LEP ion and electron count rates
ResourceHeader.Description: These data consist of ion and electron count rates taken in 18 pitch angle directions and in 29 energy channels between 10eV and 16keV (electrons) or 13ev/Q and 20keV/Q (ions). A full distribution is available each 8 seconds. Through the DARTS/LEP interface, one specifies a particular 10-deg-wide pitch angle bin and retrieves tables of ion and electron count rates with columns for the energy channels and one row for each 8-sec interval. There are companiog plots with spectrograms showing count rates vs. energy and time, one such plot for each of several ~30deg-wine pitch angle bins
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: In any publications, the use of the Akebono data should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided by T. Mukai through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, JAXA in Japan."

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: In any publications, the use of the Akebono data should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided by T. Mukai through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, JAXA in Japan."

NumericalData.Caveats: LEP count rate data may still contain background noise depending on pitch angles. The data less than 1000 cps may be unreliable. Those less than 300 cps may be very unreliable.
